attributes.action: Take action against Robert Mugabe and his illegal regime and do everything possible to deliver aid to help the people of Zimbabwe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People in Zimbabwe are victims of an illegal oppressive regime that has led to the destruction of the economy, food security, the justiciary and the health service.

History will rank Mr Mugabe alongside Hitler, Stalin and Pol Pot. We have seen only the beginning of the fall out of his failed policies and delusional ideology. It is time to make history and stand beside the people of Zimbabwe in their time of need.

It is long overdue time for Mr Mugabe to go. We call upon Mr Brown and the British Government to do everything possible to remove Mr Mugabe from power and to deliver aid to the Zimbabwean people right now in their suffering.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
